txt.en: Through following the Path of the Ancient Master, you will learn that many events can be foretold through careful observation. This will allow you to better endure your enemy's blows in a prolonged fight.
Complete the quest 'Knowledge of the Lore-master'
The Path of the Ancient Master
You have begun to follow the Path of the Ancient Master. If you follow this path to its end, you will gain insight into the events surrounding you and see how they will end.
Completed the quest 'Knowledge of the Lore-master'
Begin down the Path of the Ancient Master
There are many challenges on along the Path of the Ancient Master. Taking the first step may be the hardest....
